altTitles.ja: ××しないで！月峰さん。

description.en: Hidaka Akira is a high school student who loves solitude. He avoids the crowds in his class and decides to eat alone, but there is someone who disturbs his peace. It is Tsukimine Chiyo, the girl at the highest level in the school hierarchy, a girl who is absolutely beautiful. Tsukimine called Akira and asked him to do his "usual thing". What kind of "normal" did they mean, and why were her clothes off...?
description.ja:
「オレはただ…静かに過ごしたいだけなのに――…」

両親の転勤のおかげで念願の一人暮らしをはじめた高校生・陽高旭。孤独を愛する彼は学校でもトイレで一人ぼっちメシをキメていた。しかし、ささやかな平穏はひとりの少女…月峰千夜によって破られる。どこからともなく旭の元へ現れる千夜は彼の気弱さにつけこみ無茶を要求してきて!?
description.pt-br: Hidaka Akira é um estudante do ensino médio que adora a solidão. Ele evita as multidões em sua classe e decide comer sozinho, mas há alguém que perturba sua paz. Trata-se de Tsukimine Chiyo, a garota do mais alto nível na hierarquia da escola, uma garota absolutamente linda.

altTitles.ja: スケットダンス

description.en:
The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.ru:
"Скет Данс" - школьный клуб, чья деятельность весьма необычна - помогать в решении абсолютно любых проблем, которые возникли у учеников или даже учителей. А члены этого чудо-клуба, не менее странные личности, чем сам клуб: Боссун - гений дедуктивного мышления, Химэко - боевая единица группы и Свич - "мозг" и хакер мира сего. Вы всегда можете к ним обратиться, если осмелитесь…  
  
- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.vi:
Tình tiết xoay quanh 3 thanh niên rảnh rỗi của câu lạc bộ SKET (chuyên giải quyết mọi rắc rối cho người khác):
- 1 nam thanh niên ngáo ngơ, chỉ thông minh lúc full trang bị.
- 1 nữ thanh niên lực lưỡng, trâu chó nhất bản đồ.
- 1 nam thanh niên Otaku chỉ nói chuyện qua laptop.

Bao gồm những câu chuyện dở khóc dở cười mà cười có khi rớt hàm mà khóc thì có khi lụt nhà -  và còn chứa rất nhiều oxi drama hít hà bổ phổi (. ❛ ᴗ ❛.)

title.en: Yameru Hoshi yori Ai wo Komete

altTitles.ja: 病める惑星より愛をこめて

description.en: Suicide is a daily occurrence for people on this planet, where they coexist with "Fluffy," a special clinical creature provided by aliens with the ability to give super-powerful healing to its hosts. What is the drama for people living in this strange world?

title.en: Boku wa Ayashii Kimi no Mono

altTitles.ja: 僕は妖しいキミのもの

description.en: Shou-chan is a member of the public morals committee who wants everyone to have a healthy relationship, and is worried about his childhood friend Sayo. Because she carries the blood of a succubus, she often approaches her beloved her Shou-chan in any way to make him "lovey-dovey sex". As he persists in having a healthy relationship, which is full of lust and surrounded by questionable students, will Shou-chan manage to keep his sanity?
description.ja: どんな相手とも「正しい関係」でありたい風紀委員・しょうちゃんは、幼なじみの紗夜に悩んでいた。淫魔の血を引く彼女は、「ラブラブえっち♡」をすべく、あの手この手で大好きなしょうちゃんにアプローチ。紗夜を筆頭に、「正しくない関係」を望む妖しい生徒たちに囲まれて、しょうちゃんは正しさを守りきれるのか！？
description.es-la: Shou-chan es un miembro del comité de moral pública que quiere que todo el mundo tenga una relación sana, y está preocupado por su amiga de la infancia, Sayo. Debido a que ella lleva la sangre de un súcubo, a menudo se acerca a su amado Shou-chan, de cualquier manera para darle “sexo amoroso y alegre”. Mientras él se empeña en tener una relación sana, la cual está llena de lujuria y rodeada de estudiantes cuestionables, ¿logrará Shou-chan mantener su cordura?

title.en: Kyouiku Mama Saeko: Kono Ko no Tame Nara

altTitles.ja: 狂育ママ・サエコ─この子のためなら─

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyouiku Mama Saeko - Kono Ko no Tame Nara

altTitles.en: Saeko, the Education-Crazy Mom - If It's for This Child

description.en: Saeko is happy. Even if she is poor, even if she has no education, even if she is a single mother. As long as she has her only daughter, Yui. Beautiful Saeko dotes on her ugly daughter, who looks nothing like her, and today as well, she gathers happiness for her daughter by any means necessary.
description.ja: 紗江子は幸せだ。貧乏でも、学歴がなくても、シングルマザーでも。ただ一人、娘の唯さえいれば。美しい紗江子は全く似ていないブサイクな娘を溺愛し、娘のために今日も幸せをかき集める——どんな手を使っても…。

title.en: Captain Corinth: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer

altTitles.en: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer

altTitles.ja: 航宙軍士官、冒険者になる

altTitles.pt-br: Capitão Corinth: Um Oficial da Marinha Galáctica Torna-se um Aventureiro

description.en:
In order to protect the planet Ares from invasion by the Bugs, Alan Corinth has set his sights on nothing less than ruling the entire continent. The Kingdom of Belta, which borders the Great Demon Forest, is the ideal spot to start putting his plan in motion, so he and his party set off for the gathering place of the finest adventurers the kingdom has to offer: the citadel of Gantz.

Will Alan be able to keep the hostile aliens from overrunning this fantasy planet?  The sci-fi medieval fantasy story begins!
description.pt-br:
A nave espacial que o oficial da Marinha Imperial Galáctica que Alan Corinth estava foi derrubada por um ataque surpresa durante a navegação no hiperespaço.

Completamente a deriva, e sobre uma estranha coincidência, Alan se tornou o único na nave a sobreviver. A nave espacial severamente danificada perdeu suas capacidades de navegação e despencou em um planeta próximo.

Usando uma cápsula de fuga, Alan dirigiu-se ao planeta sozinho.

Assim começou a busca de Alan pela sobrevivência no planeta subdesenvolvido utilizando as nanomáquinas simbiótica dentro de seu corpo.

Surpreendentemente, o planeta era o lar de uma próspera civilização humana cujo código genético se assemelhava ao de Alan.

Mesmo permanecendo perdido devido a ser jogado em um mundo de espadas e magia, ele tenta viver o melhor que pode junto com seus novos companheiros.

O que Alan conseguiria nesse mundo estranho?

A história de fantasia de ficção científica em um cenário medieval agora começa!

title.en: The Secret of the Partner Next to You

description.en: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
description.ko:
평범한 남자 고등학생 양기룡.
그리고 언제나 헤실헤실하고 가끔 나사빠진 행동을 하는
그의 짝꿍 유재경.
그럭저럭 귀엽다고 생각되는 반 친구였을 뿐인데..
어느 날 우연히 그녀의 위험한 비밀을 알게 된다.
이 심장의 두근거림은 두려움인지, 설렘인지..?
description.es-la: Yang Kiryong es un chico de preparatoria común y corriente, que tiene una compañera de clase llamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, la cual es algo torpe y despistada. Ambos tienen una muy buena amistad, pero sin ningún tipo de atracción amorosa. Hasta que un día, por casualidad, Kiryong descubrió el secreto más profundo de su amiga y debido a esto su corazón empezó a latir, ¿serán latidos de miedo o amor?
description.pt-br: Yang Kiryong é um garoto comum do ensino médio que tem uma colega de classe chamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, que é um pouco desajeitada e sem noção. Ambos têm uma amizade muito boa, mas sem nenhum tipo de atração amorosa. Até que um dia, por acaso, Kiryong descobriu o segredo mais profundo de sua amiga. Por causa disso seu coração começou a bater, será de medo ou de amor?

altTitles.ja: シーイズビューティフル

description.en: In the mysterious institution of Familie, girls are raised in isolation. Kurumi, a resident child, falls asleep the day before her 10th birthday. When she next awakes, 14 years have passed. The curtain opens on this tale of misfortune, following Kurumi's journey in an unfamiliar place, surrounded by friends who have long since grown up, and ridden with missing memories.
description.es-la: En una institución misteriosa, Familie, crían chicas. Allí vivía Kurumi, el día anterior a su 10º cumpleaños, se fue a dormir. Y al despertar pasaron 14 años. Está en un lugar desconocido, sus amigas crecieron. Aquí comienza el viaje bizarro para descubrir sus memorias perdidas

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.ja: マダラランブル

description.en:
In modern Japan, where "vampires" that mimic humans and prey on them run rampant, there are girls who secretly fight these creatures, armed with silver weapons! Among the vampire exterminators is a team known as the "Madara-sou," a unit notorious for being full of "troublemakers." Newly assigned to this group is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. There, she encounters Kaika Kiriya, a woman who's particularly "dangerous," even among the eccentric residents of Madara-sou.

A thrilling, over-the-top, and occasionally heartwarming tale of friendship. Hunt, hunt, hunt! A girly vampire action story!
description.ja: 人に擬態し、人を喰う「吸血鬼」が跋扈する現代日本。ヤツらを狩るため、銀武器片手に人知れず戦う少女たちがいた！駆除業者の中でも問題児が集まった部隊・即応六班――通称「まだら荘」。吸血鬼を引き寄せる「ごちそう」体質を持ち、人を遠ざけ生きてきた昴 玲央がそこで出会ったのは、まだら荘の中でも一際美しく一際ヤバイ女・紀里谷 開花でーー。

altTitles.ja: 僕のカノジョ先生

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái tôi là cô giáo

description.en:
Can sensei be the heroine? Please?  
  
Due to a traumatic experience, I have a distrust of people called “sensei.” I, Saiki Makoto, was called by after school by the most popular and beautiful teacher at my school, Fujiki Maka-sensei.  
  
“I… love you” Eh– a confession out of the blue!? “Until you say you love me, I will continue to pursue you.”  
  
Ever since then, I’ve been called by for “guidance counselling” after school, somehow watched AV together, being given excessive skin-ship, went on dates together. Over time, I gradually became conscious of Sensei…? But isn’t it bad for Sensei to go out with her student?  
  
A romance that is absolutely NG, the forbidden love between us two.  
  
Lesson start!  
  


---

Alternative Raw: <http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/40299>
description.pt-br: Devido a uma experiência traumática, eu nunca mais confiei em pessoas com o título de “professor”. Certo dia eu, Saigi Makoto, fui chamado depois da aula pela professora mais bela de toda a escola, Fujiki Maka-sensei, para de repente ela se confessar do nada e falar que continuará me perseguindo até eu disser que sim!

title.en: Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka o Tamemasu

altTitles.ja: 老後に備えて異世界で８万枚の金貨を貯めます

altTitles.en: Saving 80,000 Gold in Another World for My Retirement

altTitles.ko: 노후를 대비해 이세계에서 금화 8만 개를 모읍니다

altTitles.zh: 为了养老金，去异界存八万金！

altTitles.zh-hk: 為了養老金，去異界存八萬金！

altTitles.fr: Économiser 80,000 pièces d'or dans un autre monde pour ma retraite

altTitles.ru: Сохранение 80 000 золотых монет в другом мире для моей старости

altTitles.es: Ahorre 80 000 monedas de oro en otro mundo en preparación para mi jubilación

description.en: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she's always dreamed of!
description.ja: 山野ミツハは18歳でありながら中学生に見られてしまう童顔小柄な少女。高校卒業を目前にして両親と頼れる兄を一度に失い、いきなり天涯孤独の身になってしまう。ショックで大学受験にも失敗して途方に暮れていたミツハは、たまたま謎の存在から「世界間転移」という能力を与えられる。そこから彼女が思いついた将来設計は、世間一般の常識の斜め上をいっていた──!!
description.pt-br: Uma garota de 18 anos que perdeu sua família em um acidente, Yamano Mitsuha cai de um penhasco em um dia qualquer e é transportada para um mundo diferente com uma civilização ao nível da Europa Medieval. Mitsuha descobre que é possível ir e retornar à terra após uma luta mortal com lobos. Assim, ela decide viver em ambos os mundos. “Para ter segurança na velhice, eu vou mirar em alcançar 80.000 moedas de ouro!” “Tentarei não deixar coisas estranhas circularem para não distorcer o progresso do mundo, mas não vou me conter pelo bem da minha vida fácil e segura!” Enquanto usa três pistolas junto com palavras e ações que parecem decentes, em sua cabeça Yamano Mitsuha é uma garota esperta. Fazendo um esforço para ganhar dinheiro mesmo com um pequeno corpo que parece uma criança para os ocidentais!

altTitles.en: Don't Mess with the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/dennou319)  
- [Mangaka's YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIhPflgXxYM9dsOzaI0sYgA)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://eizouken-anime.com/)  
- [Official Live-Action (JP)](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

altTitles.ja: 甘えさせて雛森さん！

description.en:
Suou Yaya is admired by the whole school. Perfect grades, beautiful, an exemplary girl overall worthy of the praise she receives. From afar, her childish underclassman Hinamori Ichigo yearns to be like her...

...That is, until she finds her beloved Suou-senpai is a LOT more childish than her, and wants to be spoiled rotten, lest she'll throw a tantrum.
description.pt-br:
Suou Yaya é admirada por toda escola. Notas perfeitas, linda, uma garota exemplar no geral digna dos elogios que recebe. De longe, sua caloura infantil Hinamori Ichigo deseja ser como ela...

...Isto é, até que ela descubra que sua amado Suou-senpai é MUITO mais infantil do que ela, e quer ser mimada, para que ela não faça birra.

title.en: Kono Koi wo Hoshi ni wa Negawanai

altTitles.ja: この恋を星には願わない

altTitles.en: There is No Love Wishing Upon a Star

description.en:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.
description.ja: 幼い頃からいつも一緒に過ごしてきた冬葵と瑛莉と京。これまでずっと友達としての関係を続けてきたが、冬葵は瑛莉に対して友達以上の感情を抱いていた。そんなある日、３人は久々に遊園地に遊びにいくのだが、そこで冬葵は自身の恋が叶わぬものであると知ってしまい――

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

altTitles.ja: カワイイなんて聞いてない！！

altTitles.zh: 我才没听说过他这么可爱！！

altTitles.vi: Tôi chưa từng biết rằng cậu ấy lại dễ thương tới vậy

description.en:
Madoka is obsessed with shoujo manga—specifically manga that features younger, innocent guys who fall for their Senpai. So she should be thrilled when a gorgeous kohai comes to work at her father’s restaurant…except he’s rude and standoffish, and wants nothing to do with her. But when she protects him from some extra-pushy fans, he finds that maybe he’s found someone letting his walls down for…!

---
Madoka is a high school girl who loves cute younger boys. One day, Shikura arrives as a part-time worker at her parents' diner! Shikura is beautiful and handsome, but he's not super nice?! She thought she would never like him, but the way he sometimes looks is agonizingly cute! How can she not really like him?!
description.fr:
Madoka est obsédée par les mangas shoujo, en particulier ceux mettant en scène de jeunes hommes innocents tombant amoureux de leur Senpai. Elle devrait être ravie lorsqu'un magnifique kohai commence à travailler dans le restaurant de son père, sauf qu'il est impoli et distant, ne voulant rien avoir à faire avec elle. Cependant, quand elle le protège contre des fans trop insistants, il réalise qu'il a peut-être trouvé quelqu'un capable de faire tomber ses barrières...!

---
Madoka est une lycéenne qui adore les jeunes garçons mignons. Un jour, Shikura arrive comme employé à temps partiel dans le diner de ses parents ! Shikura est beau et séduisant, mais il n'est pas très gentil ?! Elle pensait ne jamais l'apprécier, mais la façon dont il regarde parfois est douloureusement mignonne ! Comment ne pourrait-elle pas vraiment l'aimer ?!

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio Kuzuhana-chan

description.en: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr: Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359! Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix. Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja: 男女比率1対359!! 359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!! つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!! コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!! 四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br: Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?! Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

description.en: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、軍を退役してから約20年。主人公は未だ独身で、もう40代も半ば。Eランクの落ちこぼれ教師として生活するある日、彼の学園にエリートの「モンスター娘」が転校してくるのだった。。
description.vi: Câu chuyện về một ông giáo trung niên (trước đây là một anh hùng) ở dị giới tình cờ gặp lại cô học trò vốn dĩ là con bạch tuộc cute phô mai que mà anh từng cứu giúp và dạy dỗ trước đây.
description.pt-br: Cerca de 20 anos se passaram desde que o protagonista foi convocado para outro mundo e se aposentou do exército. Ele ainda está solteiro na casa dos 40 anos e vive como um professor de baixo escalão, até que um dia, uma 'garota monstro' de elite é transferida para sua classe.

The year is 1420. A small village in the Kingdom of Bohemia is wiped out by marauding Crusader knights. A young peasant girl named Šárka is the sole survivor of the massacre. She meets up with Jan Žižka, leader of the Hussite army, and chooses to take up arms…
___

description.pt-br: O ano é 1420. Uma pequena vila no Reino da Boêmia é destruída por cavaleiros da cruzada. Uma jovem camponesa chamada Sarka é a única sobrevivente do massacre. Ela se encontra com Jan Zizka, líder do exército hussita, e decide pegar em armas…

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫【ヴァンパイア】美夕 朔
吸血姫美夕 朔

description.en: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

description.en:
"I shall devour this Jianghu!"

Says a mysterious son of the fruit merchant, holding the Monarch Sword in his left hand, and the Hell Blade on his right.

Possessing not only eloquence but even an overwhelming martial prowess, what could be his ultimate goal?

The delightful journey of the twenty year old youth, ' Jeok Leegeon', who dreams of dominating the martial world, begins!

description.en: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life. ;_;
description.vi: Đây là câu chuyện về gã chủ nhân mua nô lệ, chăm sóc giáo dục các bé lên người để hiện thực hoá giấc mơ dàn harem lý tưởng
description.es-la: Un hombre compra 3 esclavas Lolis para así poder criarlas y convertirlas en mujeres de su agrado para que posteriormente cuando crezcan completamente de acuerdo a sus gustos pueda hacerles el sin respeto a gusto las veces que quiera
description.pt-br: Um homem compra três pequenas escravas e começa a transformá-las em garotas perfeitas para seu harém.

altTitles.es-la: Subiendo de nivel con las mejores habilidades

description.en:
In the year 2020, humanity faces a crisis as Earth is attacked by unidentified monsters. Players prepare for the attack by challenging the Labyrinth that appeared. They can choose four options:

Easy Mode, where anyone can survive; Normal Mode, where you must work to survive; Hard Mode, where only 1% could survive; and Solo Mode, the harshest difficulty.

Kang TaeSan, the strongest Easy Mode player cleared the Labyrinth using an unconventional approach and acquired skills others could not: [ Addition, Multiplication, Attack Nullification, Ultimate Judgement...].

But because he chose Easy Mode, his power was lacking. Unable to prevent the extinction of humanity, he lay dying. A miraculous chance appears.

"This time I'll definitely become stronger."

Challenging the Labyrinth again, this is Skill-based Player Kang TaeSan's Solo Mode Attack Record!

After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

’99 Boss’ (meaning the best fighter among those born in 1999). The protagonist, Na Seon-wook, was born with the heart of a tiger. He was a troublemaker, but at the request of his parents, he hid his strength and transferred to Gukyang High School, a school located in a remote area that he thought would be quiet. However, it was a place where various old-fashioned cultures and dangerous people gathered. Seon-wook, who wanted to graduate quietly, eventually he couldn’t help but feel his hot blood and began educating them!

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティー辞めます。

altTitles.en: I Quit the Party of the Brave.

description.en:
Raniel Van Trias, the Ashen Wizard, is a highly skilled mage set on defeating the Demon King. After years of fighting alongside the renowned Hero's Party and multiple encounters with the Demon King, he is ousted from the party, left with a curse on his heart, forced to lose half his lifespan, and transformed into a woman! 

Undeterred, Raniel becomes an assistant professor at the Royal Apelia Academy as Rania and searches for a way to lift the curse, oblivious to how challenging his task may be...

---

[Official Japanese release](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/148780)

[Official French release](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/1483)
description.ko:
마왕을 무찌르고 세상을 구원하기 위해 모인 최강의 용사파티가 있었다.

하지만 마왕 토벌엔 관심이 없고편한 전장만 찾는 용사 파티에 환멸을 느낀 잿빛 마법사 라니엘은,결국 파티를 때려치우고 고향으로 돌아와 스승을 만난다.그런 그에게 라니엘의 스승인 로셀은명문 아카데미, 아플리아의 조교수 자리를 권하게 된다.

"아니, 이걸 왜 못하지?"
"그냥 회로 생성하고 쓰면 되는데?"

하지만 세계관 최강자도 막상 가르침에는 소질이 없는 듯 한데...

어찌저찌 아플리아 아카데미에 취직하게 된 인류 최강 전력.먼치킨 마법사의 좌충우돌 아카데미 조교수기가 시작된다!

title.en: I Became the Childhood Friend of the Obsessive Second Male Lead

description.en: Rieta, staying with a military ducal family, decided to help Noel, the second male lead, by coaching him on winning the female lead’s heart. After years of guidance, Rieta was confident Noel would succeed. However, in a surprising twist, Noel complimented Rieta instead, misapplying her advice. Flustered, Rieta realized her friend had taken her words to heart, but not in the way she intended.

altTitles.en: I Will Live as an Actor

altTitles.ja: 役者として生きる

description.en: To escape a life of poverty, Jang Youngkuk aspired to be a famous actor. And he succeeds... at the cost of his mother's life. Upon proceeding to take his own out of despair, Youngkuk miraculously returns to his childhood. With a second chance to make things right, he swears to abandon acting and be the good son he never was. However, when financial troubles begin to haunt Youngkuk and his mother, he discovers that he may have no choice but to return to the set for one last take.

Two years have passed since Eden was trapped in a dark fantasy game set in a medieval world with a reputation for extreme difficulty.

He has struggled as a paladin and succeeded in destroying 49 demons, now finally able to proceed with the main story of the game. However, the more he plays, the more irregularities occur and the story and relationships with the NPCs change.

Will he be able to prevent the destruction in the game and survive despite the numerous irregularities?
description.ko: 극악 난이도를 자랑하는 멸망 위기의 중세 다크 판타지 배경의 게임 속에 떨어진지 2년. 아이덴은 성기사로서 분투하여 49명의 악마를 멸하는 것에 성공, 성기사로 임명 받으며, 드디어 게임 속 메인 스토리를 진행할 수 있게 된다. 그러나 플레이를 하면 할수록 변칙이 생기며 틀어지는 스토리와 NPC들과의 관계. 수많은 변칙에도 불구하고 게임 속 멸망을 막고 자신도 살아남을 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Dois anos se passaram desde que Eden ficou preso em um jogo de fantasia sombria ambientado em um mundo medieval conhecido por sua dificuldade extrema. Ele lutou como paladino, destruindo 49 demônios. Finalmente, agora podendo avançar na história principal do jogo. No entanto, quanto ele mais joga, mais irregularidades ocorrem, afetando a história e os relacionamentos com os NPCs. Conseguirá ele evitar a destruição no jogo e sobreviver apesar das inúmeras irregularidades?

altTitles.vi: Ta Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta Ở Tokyo Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta, Sáng Tạo Ra Đô Thị Truyền Thuyết

description.en: The protagonist Yuan Zhenji crossed to the parallel world of Jiangshi, and found that this world was full of various horror and weirdness, and ordinary humans were as fragile as paper in front of them. He used a notebook called "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals and contain weirdness, absorb the weird rule ability "use magic to defeat magic", and become a monitor who fights against weirdness, and fights with his partners against the coming doomsday-level weirdness...
description.vi:
Sau khi xuyên không tới đất nước Nhật Bản trong thế giới song song, Kanbaru Shinji có được một quyển sổ ghi chép tên là Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị Thực Lục.
Mọi truyền thuyết đô thị cậu ghi vào đó đều có thể trở thành sự thật.
Mà Nhật Bản ở thế giới này còn thiếu khuyết rất nhiều truyền thuyết đô thị từng xuất hiện trong kiếp trước như là Hanako nhà vệ sinh, Thiếu Nữ Đến Từ Địa Ngục, Quý bà Hachishaku, Cuộc gọi của Mary, Con Mắt Trong Khe Hở...
Kanbaru Shinji: “Để ta khiến cho Nhật Bản này quần ma loạn vũ đi!”
Tóm tắt theo tiểu thuyết gốc, bản manhua đã chỉnh sửa rất nhiều từ tên nhân vật cho đến bối cảnh, vui lòng theo dõi truyện để biết thêm chi tiết.

altTitles.ja: ナノ魔神

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

description.en: 18 years ago, a prophecy emerged that a boy with a black ring, deemed inferior, would rewrite the survival rules of the world of the gifted. The only remaining descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status, Shannon, wears a black ring and lives as an inferior being in the filthy exile zone. However, his peaceful life is shattered when his identity is exposed, and the top-tier forces, seeing him as a threat, send out an assassination squad to kill Shannon. Five gifted individuals, who have existed since childhood to protect Shannon, are summoned at the same time. They rush to the exile zone to protect the last descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status, and a battle among the “rings” is about to ignite!

title.en: I Tamed a Tyrant and Ran Away

altTitles.de: Ich zähmte den Tyrannen und rannte weg

altTitles.fr: Fuir le tyran que j'ai crée
J'ai apprivoisé un tyran et me suis enfuie

altTitles.pt: Eu domei um tirano e escapei

altTitles.fa: یک ستمگر رو رام کردم و بعدش فرار کردم

altTitles.ja: 暴君を手懐けて逃げてしまった

altTitles.zh-hk: 我在馴服暴君後落跑了

altTitles.vi: Thuần Hóa Bạo Chúa Rồi Bỏ Trốn

description.en:
God gave me a chance to relive my life. Before my rebirth, I'd been used for the past 400 years as the empire's sword. And so, I swore to destroy the empire. I found the young prince of the country and became his teacher. I taught him how to become a tyrant and asked for the country.

"I will do as the lady wishes."

He conquered the whole empire for me, and I ran away.

"I came to take you, Charlize Ronan," Dylan had become a perfect tyrant and searched the entire empire for me.

"You tamed me, so why did you run away?"

---
All Charlize Ronan ever wanted was to bring honor to her family. But instead, she is forced into becoming a “living sword” -- a mere tool for the emperors. It is from this hell that she prays for justice… and awakens in her former body. Now, determined to tear down this horrible empire, Charlize seeks out the young prince, Dylan Blade. She will put him on the throne, not as an honorable ruler, but as a tyrant. It is time for Charlize to tame the one who will bring forth her revenge.

---

description.es:
Dios me dio la oportunidad de revivir mi vida. Antes de mi renacimiento, me habían utilizado durante los últimos 400 años como espada del imperio. Y así, juré destruir el imperio. Encontré al joven príncipe del país y me convertí en su maestra. Le enseñé a convertirse en un tirano y le pregunté por el país.

"Haré lo que la dama desee."

Conquistó todo el imperio para mí y me escapé.

"Vine a llevarte, Charlize Ronan." Dylan se había convertido en un perfecto tirano y me buscó por todo el imperio.

"Me domaste, así que ¿por qué te escapaste?"

---

description.ru:
Бог дал мне еще один шанс и наконец я вернулась спустя четыреста лет. Как только я поняла, что вернулась, я решила, что «Никто не должен быть охвачен гордыней». Моей целью было уничтожить страну. Итак, я выросла с гениальным принцем, который жил в подполье и ожидал возможности для возвращения. Он захватил Империю для меня, и я оставила его, чтобы он достиг своей цели.
— Я пришел, чтобы забрать тебя, Шарлиз Ронан.
Через несколько лет поисков по всему континенту Дилан, ставший идеальным тираном, нашел меня.
— Почему ты сбежала?!

---

description.uk:
Кейра – меч імператорів, що несе славу та розквіт Імперії Блейд. Ніхто й подумати не може, що колись цей меч був людиною. 
Шарліз Ронан лише хотіла стати честю своєї сім'ї. Погодившись стати імперським лицарем, вона не знала, на які страждання себе прирекла. Хоч її тіло перетворили на меч, та розум завжди був у свідомості. З самого пекла вона молилася про справедливість.

«Я не проклятий меч! Я – людина!»

Їй дали другий шанс. Шанс на помсту. Шарліз рішуче вирішила знищити Імперію Блейд. Вона посадить на трон Ділана, тринадцятого принца, не як почесного правителя, а як жорсткого тирана. Вона зруйнує імперію навіть ціною власного життя.

«Шарліз, чому ти спочатку підкорила мене, а потім залишила?»

description.en:
Han Xiao, a veteran player of the game "Galaxy" died unexpectedly in the middle of doing a leveling request. He was transmitted to the game world ten years earlier and became an NPC with a player's panel and was reborn in the base of the game's villain. In order to survive, Han Xiao resolutely chose the "Mechanic" occupation and concentrated on cultivation. Familiar with the iterations and rules of multiple versions of the game, he vowed to lead the army of machines, overthrow the villains, and rise from scratch to become the strongest.

Alternative RAWs:
[IQIYI](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1ttzvn5jsqd.html)
[BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30386)

title.en: Kanojo ga Kuzu wo Aisuru Wake wa.

altTitles.ja: 彼女がクズを愛するワケは。

description.ja: みーちゃんは、金なし職なし浮気者のヒロくんが大好き！だって１週間以上付き合ってくれたし、待ち合わせ時間を覚えてくれてたし、ちゃんと名前を覚えててくれるから！あまりにも彼氏に求めるハードルが低すぎるみーちゃんに、ヒロくんはクズになりきれずに大困惑！クズだけど優しい。優しいけどクズ。そんな彼が大好きなみーちゃんのクズ愛コメディー！

description.en:
Rai Genji always dreamed of being a top football player, especially one to play for Japan. And by the efforts of his passion, he was invited to the Blue Lock project, where he developed his ego. Coming across foes, rivals, teammates, and friends; Rai needs to learn and adapt to the constant improvement of everyone else to hone his skills to a professional level. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he fall into the pit of losers.?

Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock knock-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series, but with an original twist on the characters, plot line, events, etc.

altTitles.ja: 邪神ちゃんドロップキック

description.en:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)
description.ja:
魔界の悪魔、通称「邪神ちゃん」は、ある日突然、人間界に召喚されてしまう。
彼女を召喚したのは、神保町のボロアパートで暮らす、ちょっとブラックな心を持つ女子大生、花園ゆりねだった。しかもゆりねは、邪神ちゃんを魔界に帰す方法がわからないと言う。仕方なく一緒に暮らし始めた邪神ちゃんとゆりね。しかし、召喚者が死ねば魔界に帰れることから邪神ちゃんはゆりねを……!?
少女と邪神ちゃんが繰り広げるちょっとキケンな同居生活コメディ！
description.pt-br:
Jashin-chan Dropkick é uma comédia violenta sobre uma lolita gótica, Yurine, que invoca uma garota demônio com um rabo de cobra, Jashin-chan.
Elas terão que viver juntas até que Yurine encontre uma maneira de enviar Jashin-chan de volta ao inferno, ou até que Jashin-chan mate Yurine.

title.en: The Great Mage of the Hero's Party Reincarnates

altTitles.en: The Rebirth of the Hero's Party's Archmage

altTitles.es-la: El renacimiento del archimago del grupo del héroe

description.en:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as “the Abyss,” which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rin’s body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words “I’ll come back,” Rin’s soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.
description.es-la: El genio mago Lynn se embarca en un gran viaje a la edad de 13 años. Junto con el grupo de héroes, liderado por Esther, su objetivo es derrotar al gran malvado "Abismo" que pretende llevar al mundo al caos. Sin embargo, las batallas se vuelven cada vez más feroces y en el momento final, Lynn sucumbe al oscuro veneno del "Abismo". Dejando atrás las palabras "Volveré", el alma de Lynn permanece dormida durante 300 años, antes de resucitar en el cuerpo de un niño de noble cuna. Así comienza su segunda vida en un mundo pacífico. Pero mientras tanto, una fuerza oscura está acechando una vez más, amenazando con hundir al mundo en la confusión una vez más.
